content:
We have created this stream to carry announcements of interest to the community. Announcements will include
- creation of new streams, so that people can join if intersted
- new releases of FHIR,
- event notifications (please ask an FMG member to make those, so we filter them)
I have subscribed everyone to this stream - it will be low volume

one more announcement: we've made some brief documentation around community expectations. Please all read http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Chat.fhir.org_community_expectations. we'll be adding this to the sign up page
